attributes.action: Hold a Vote of no Confidence regarding our current government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the recently publicised debacle where HMRC have "Lost" highly sensitive personal details for approx 25 Million citizens I propose that a Vote of No Confidence is held for this Government.

This issue has effectively enabled identity fraud for a significant proportion of the population and as such     represents a massive breach of trust and uncovers civil service incompetence of a breathtakingly severe level.

The situation is unacceptable and trust must be restored, however difficult it is for the potential damage to be undone.

This government must respectfully accept it has failed one of it's primary duties of care to it's own citizens and act accordingly.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
